name: Cannon Fodder (itch) (Random Precision Software)
description:
Cannon Fodder

Top down shooter.  Kill enemy soldiers ,& pickup loot to add to your score

Enemy soldiers have individual ranges that come to attack you.

Remember if you fire bullets and there not going anywhere its because your shooting uphill (Even in a computer game bullets dont go uphill ! LOL)

***********************************************

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE AND LEVEL 1  IS PLAYABLE 

I am asking you guys what project I should carry on with.  The others include:

Uridium 2

Gauntlet

Deflektor
